questions.context: Direction: Read the e-mail below.From: LuisTo: MichelleSubject: Hotel adviceSent: February 10, 11:31 P.M.Hi, Michelle.How have you been? I hope you are fine.I am scheduled to go on a business trip next month, and I will stay at the SKY Hotel. I heard that you stayed there last time. How was the hotel?If you could give me some information on the hotel, I would really appreciate it.Regards, LuiDirections: Respond to the e-mail. In your e-mail, include THREE inconvenient details.

emailDetails.subject: Hotel advice
emailDetails.content: Hi, Michelle.How have you been? I hope you are fine.I am scheduled to go on a business trip next month, and I will stay at the SKY Hotel. I heard that you stayed there last time. How was the hotel?If you could give me some information on the hotel, I would really appreciate it.Regards, LuiDirections: Respond to the e-mail. In your e-mail, include THREE inconvenient details.

questions.context: Direction: Read the e-mail below.From: JeffTo: SKY InstituteSubject: Part-time jobSent: May 20, 09:31 Α.Μ.To whom it may concern:I saw your job opening on the AVD Web site, and I am interested in the part-time job.If you give me a chance, I'd like to do the part-time job at your institute to improve my work skills.However, I cannot find any information on your institute, so I'd appreciate it if you could send me some information regarding it.Thank you for your time and consideration in this matter. I look forward to your reply.Best Regards,JeffDirections: Respond to the e-mail. In your e-mail, give TWO pieces of information about the SKY Institute and ONE suggestion for applying for the part-time job.

emailDetails.subject: Part-time job
emailDetails.content: To whom it may concern:I saw your job opening on the AVD Web site, and I am interested in the part-time job.If you give me a chance, I'd like to do the part-time job at your institute to improve my work skills.However, I cannot find any information on your institute, so I'd appreciate it if you could send me some information regarding it.Thank you for your time and consideration in this matter. I look forward to your reply.Best Regards,JeffDirections: Respond to the e-mail. questions.context: "Praising is the best way to motivate employees."Do you agree or disagree with the statement above?
